full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RANG GZHAN GYI BKRA SHIS DGE MTSAN SPEL PHYIR BYIN CHEN 'BEBS GSOL 'DEBS AE WAm CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
